full_address: 40 Teagarden Street, Eight Mile Plains, Qld 4113
listing_company_name: LJ Hooker Property Partners - Sunnybank Hills and Mount Gravatt
description:
This classic, double-storey brick residence has a timeless beauty about it that's utterly alluring. Sitting on a prominent 682 sqm corner block, it is located in a serene yet convenient Eight Mile Plains street that's just a stroll from parks, buses, shops and the popular Warrigal Road State School, and offers families a peaceful suburban lifestyle with a bounty of space.

Five bedrooms and three bathrooms populate its charming walls with some of its finest features including a cosy brick fireplace, two garden sheds and multiple lounging areas both inside and out. It's time to upgrade your family's lifestyle and embark on a more idyllic future at 40 Teagarden Street.

It's top five highlights include:

- On large 682 sqm fully fenced corner block with expansive, lush lawns for children and pets to play on
- Multiple relaxation zones throughout including spacious carpeted lounge with fireplace, formal dining room, and open plan family meals and living room with air conditioning
- Massive patio in backyard for alfresco hosting or unwinding, plus two garden sheds for added storage
- Five large bedrooms, four with air conditioning and master with walk-in robe and huge ensuite
- Phenomenal location: walk to parks, Warrigal Road Primary, buses, and shops, with motorways, shopping/dining precincts, hospitals and more minutes away

This sprawling residence has a truly enviable position with most local amenities a walk away and further coveted shopping hubs, dining precincts, and medical centres simply a short drive away. Both the Gateway and Pacific motorways are also within easy reach as well so you can hop on the highway and commute to the city, take a day trip to the Sunshine Coast or Gold Coast, or catch a flight overseas or interstate at Brisbane Airport.

- 270 m to Norup Park
- 300 m to Warrigal Road State School
- 500 m to bus stop
- 550 m to Warrigal Square Shopping Centre
- 650 m to Runcorn Plaza
- 2.4 km to Runcorn State High School
- 4.4 km to Market Square
- 4.5 km to Westfield Mt Gravatt
- 4.9 km to Sunnybank Private Hospital
- 5 km to Sunnybank Plaza
- 7.7 km to QEII Jubilee Hospital

The home's presence is undeniably dignified as it sits on its large corner block behind a stately brick fence with ornate, white iron pedestrian gates. A wide driveway gives way to a secure double garage and beckons you into the front yard where a shady tree is matched with gently sloping lawns perfect for children and pets to play on.

The grand, pillared portico is flanked by charming, mullioned windows on either side of the white timber door complete with elegant stained glass. It ushers you through to a gleaming foyer with retro polished cork floors and a charismatic winding timber staircase.

To the left, a spacious carpeted lounge is revealed for comfy winter relaxation or large festive gatherings and has been finished with a soaring raked ceiling, a beautiful brick fireplace and decadent drapes over its immense arched window.

Through an arched doorway you'll find a big, carpeted formal dining room with timeless pendant light and raked ceiling. Lovely and bright with access out to the massive patio, it serves as a delightful area for refined dinner parties or festive family meals.

Slip through another door and the huge original kitchen will open up before you with endless amounts of cupboard space and easy-care laminate countertops. A raised oven and electric stovetop allow feasts to be created with ease, while a dishwasher will make clean up a sinch. A breakfast bar allows you to feed all the kids on the go and will keep you abreast of any conversations happening nearby in the open plan family meals and lounge area.

This expansive area is air conditioned for daily comfort and features rustic polished cork floors for low maintenance living. It flows out a sliding door onto the massive and partially enclosed patio for seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining. There's plenty of space here for both alfresco dining or unwinding and with gorgeous views of the easy-care, fenced backyard it would make a wonderful outdoor entertainment zone.

Lush level lawns in the backyard will act as a lovely setting for playing family games over the coming summer holidays, and with two garden sheds discreetly hidden from view, gardeners and hobbyists will appreciate the additional storage space for all their tools.

For large families or those living with relatives, this home has plenty of space with five spacious bedrooms found upstairs. All the bedrooms are carpeted with four featuring air conditioning, and the master boasting a walk-in robe and big ensuite with bathtub, huge shower and trendy, pink-topped vanity.

A further two shared bathrooms in immaculate condition can be found across the two levels for the convenience of guests and occupants.

A gorgeous classic with copious amounts of space, this well-placed family residence is awaiting your inspection. Contact Zora Liu today before it's sold.

We are committed to the health and safety of our customers and staff, and their families. When entering a premises please adhere to all social distancing (2m2 apart for spaces less that 200m2 and 4m2 apart for spaces more than 200m2) and strict hygiene requirements. Please also ensure that you follow social distancing measures and keep 1.5m away from each other.

All information contained herein is gathered from sources we consider to be reliable. However we can not guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided and interested parties must solely rely on their own enquiries.
